overview: Three years after author Kate Sanders penned a best selling novel about a serial killer, she has become the victim of a twisted tale of art imitating life -- left crippled after fleeing a deadly and psychotic reader, she lives in isolation, connected to the world only through the Internet.  But with the release of her sequel, the nightmare begins again...
tagline: She created a killer in her best selling book. Now she's his next victim.
title: Closer and Closer
